content.question: ​The temperature, in degrees Celsius (<math alttext="degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>), in a city on a particular day is modeled by the function <math alttext="T"><semantics><mi>T</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> defined by <math alttext="T open parentheses t close parentheses equals fraction numerator 75 t cubed minus 836 t squared plus 3100 t minus 4185 over denominator 14 t squared plus 10 t minus 35 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>T</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>75</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>836</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3100</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4185</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>14</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>35</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is measured in hours from <math alttext="12"><semantics><mn>12</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> p.m. for <math alttext="2 less or equal than t less or equal than 9"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Based on the model, how many hours did it take for the temperature to increase from <math alttext="0 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> to <math alttext="5 degree text C end text"><semantics><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>°</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
